.library-search   .button{line-height:240%;font-size:140%;padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px;}.library-search label{font-size:1.1rem;}.library-search input[type="text"]{font-size:120%;padding-left:28px;border:1px solid #ddd;color:#555;box-shadow:none;background:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) 8px calc(50% - 1px) no-repeat;height:46px;background-size:18px auto;border-radius:2px;}.library-search input[type="text"]:focus{border:1px solid #bebebe;}.library-search select{height:auto;font-size:130%;line-height:165%;}@media only screen and (min-width :768px){.library-search .button{margin-top:1.85em;}.library-search input[type="text"]{font-size:140%;background-size:25px auto;padding-left:36px;}}@media only screen and (max-width :480px){.pane-panels-mini .accordion .accordion-navigation &gt; .content,.pane-panels-mini .accordion dd &gt; .content{padding:0rem;}}.small-collapse .library-search .columns{padding-left:0 !important;padding-right:0 !important;}.libraryh3lp a{background:#8b0000;padding:.6rem 1rem;border-radius:40px;color:#ffffff;position:fixed;bottom:20px;right:2rem;z-index:600;transition:background-color 200ms linear 0s,transform 200ms linear 0s;color:#fff;}#return-to-top{visibility:hidden;}@media screen and (min-width:40em){.libraryh3lp a{right:6rem;}#return-to-top{visibility:visible;}}.libraryh3lp a:hover{background:#720000;}.libraryh3lp i{padding-right:0.5rem;font-size:120%;}
.site-search   .button{line-height:240%;font-size:140%;padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px;}.site-search label{font-size:1.1rem;}.site-search input[type="text"]{font-size:120%;padding-left:28px;border:1px solid #ddd;color:#555;box-shadow:none;background:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) 8px calc(50% - 1px) no-repeat;height:46px;background-size:18px auto;border-radius:2px;}.site-search input[type="text"]:focus{border:1px solid #bebebe;}@media only screen and (min-width :768px){.site-search .button{margin-top:.66em;}.site-search input[type="text"]{font-size:140%;background-size:25px auto;padding-left:36px;}}.small-collapse .site-search .columns{padding-left:0 !important;padding-right:0 !important;}
